questions.question: 景気回復の兆しが見えてきたとはいえ、まだまだ（  ）状況だ。
questions.hint:
景気（けいき, keiki）- economic condition
兆し（きざし, kizashi）- sign

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 予断を許さない（よだんをゆるさない）– unpredictable; precarious

  • 雲行きがいい – weather looks good (figuratively: situation looks favorable)
  • 有頂天な – elated
  • 手ごたえのある – rewarding

Translation: Although signs of economic recovery are visible, the situation remains unpredictable.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 予断を許さない – unpredictable

  • 雲行きがいい – favorable weather
  • 有頂天な – elated
  • 手ごたえのある – rewarding

Translation: Although signs of economic recovery are visible, the situation remains unpredictable.

questions.question: 彼の意見は、長年の経験に（  ）している。
questions.hint:
経験（けいけん, keiken）- experience
意見（いけん, iken）- opinion

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 裏打ちする（うらうち）– to support, to back up

  • 拒絶 – rejection
  • 妨害 – obstruction
  • 執着 – obsession

Translation: His opinion is supported by many years of experience.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 裏打ち – backing, support

  • 拒絶 – rejection
  • 妨害 – obstruction
  • 執着 – obsession

Translation: His opinion is supported by many years of experience.

questions.question: どんな困難な状況でも、彼は（  ）態度を崩さなかった。
questions.hint:
困難（こんなん, konnan）- difficulty
態度（たいど, taido）- attitude

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 冷静な（れいせいな）– calm

  • 無謀な – reckless
  • 粗末な – crude, shabby
  • 野蛮な – barbaric

Translation: No matter the hardship, he remained calm.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 冷静な – calm

  • 無謀な – reckless
  • 粗末な – crude
  • 野蛮な – barbaric

Translation: No matter the hardship, he remained calm.

questions.question: その話は信ぴょう性に（  ）。
questions.hint: 信ぴょう性（しんぴょうせい, shinpyousei）- credibility

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 欠ける（かける）– to lack

  • 及ぶ – to reach
  • 際立つ – to stand out
  • 寄与する – to contribute

Translation: That story lacks credibility.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 欠ける – to lack

  • 及ぶ – to reach
  • 際立つ – to stand out
  • 寄与する – to contribute

Translation: That story lacks credibility.

questions.question: 新商品が発売されたが、売れ行きは（  ）。
questions.hint:
売れ行き（うれゆき, ureyuki）- sales
発売（はつばい, hatsubai）- release

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 芳しくない（かんばしくない）– not favorable

  • 華々しい – brilliant
  • 快調な – smooth-running
  • 急伸する – to surge

Translation: The product was launched, but sales were not good.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 芳しくない – not favorable

  • 華々しい – brilliant
  • 快調な – smooth-running
  • 急伸する – to surge

Translation: The product was launched, but sales were not good.

questions.question: 彼の不適切な発言は会議の雰囲気を（  ）させた。
questions.hint:
会議（かいぎ, kaigi）- meeting
雰囲気（ふんいき, fun'iki）- atmosphere

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 白ける（しらける）– to dampen the mood

  • 落ち着ける – to calm
  • 引き立てる – to promote
  • 盛り上げる – to liven up

Translation: His inappropriate comment ruined the mood of the meeting.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 白ける – to ruin the mood

  • 落ち着ける – to calm
  • 引き立てる – to promote
  • 盛り上げる – to liven up

Translation: His inappropriate comment ruined the mood of the meeting.

questions.question: この件に関しては、社内での（  ）が求められる。
questions.hint:
件（けん, ken）- matter
求める（もとめる, motomeru）- to require

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 合意（ごうい）– consensus, agreement

  • 防衛 – defense
  • 模倣 – imitation
  • 治療 – treatment

Translation: Regarding this matter, internal agreement is required.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 合意 – consensus

  • 防衛 – defense
  • 模倣 – imitation
  • 治療 – treatment

Translation: Regarding this matter, internal agreement is required.
